t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_4::go: Sagalee Bakka qaamichaaf barbaachisaa ta'ee waraabi.
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_12::g: Gaafadhu: Waa'ee gara fuulduraakee nutti himuu dandeessaa?
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_10::g: Sagalee taatichaa namoota biroo wajjin wal quunnamuu waraabi
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_13::g: Sagalee waan taatichaaf barbaachisummaa qabuu waraabi.
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_11::g: Sagalee waan taatichi bashannanaaf godhuu waraabi.
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_9::go: Sagalee bakka qaamichi itti dhiisifatuu waraabi.
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_3::go: Sagalee yeroo qaamichi guyyichaaf qophaa'uu waraabi.
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_8::go: Sagalee hojii qaamichaaf barbaachisaa ta'ee waraabi.
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_2::go: Sagalee waa'ee mana namichaa waan qabatamuu qabuu waraabi.
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_5::go: Gaafadhu: Waa'ee waan hojjettuu nutti himuu dandeesaa?
t_audio_day_in_the_life::clip_card_6::go: Waan qaamichi hojjetu kan seenichaaf barbaachisaa ta'e waraabi.
t_audio_day_in_the_life::text_card_0::te: Guyyaan jireenya keessaa seenicha guutuu keessatti qaamicha hordofa. Seenaan guyyaa kallattii hordofuu danda'a, yookaan kutaa barbaachisaa guyyaa salphaatti agarsiisuu danda'a. Qajoojiin kun qaamicha hojii adda ta'ee wajjin hordofaa jirta jedhee  tilmaama, garuu muraaleen guyyaa yookaan hojii nama kamiiyyuu galmeessuuf fayyaduu danda'a. Yoo caalmaatti naaf hojjetu jettee yaadde bilisa ta'uudhaan gaaffii filannoof ta'a jettu gaafadhu.
t_audio_day_in_the_life::title: Sagalee Guyyaa Jireenyaa keessaa
